meaningMnemonic: You put a <radical>lid</radical> on your <radical>father</radical>. But, he won't taste good alone, so you <kanji>mix</kanji> in some other ingredients. They <kanji>mingle</kanji> inside the pot with him.
readingMnemonic: With a <kanji>mix</kanji> of your father and other ingredients <kanji>mingl</kanji>ing in your cooking pot, you lift up the lid... your father pops up. Your father is <reading>こう</reading>いち. He stares back at you with a big smile.
